column5: Well, i coaxed the old  man into going out for an hour this morning, even though he called me at quarter after six complaining that it was raining heavily and blah blah blah... I didn't know what to expect with the rain we got last night, but the river was only up about a foot and the water was only a little dirty. As soon as we walked down to the hole i frequent we seen a few jumping around. So it was a good thing i brought my dad out cause he went 2/2 and got a pretty nice workout on the one nice seven pounder. I ended up getting one little one no bigger than 2 pounds. I guess it pays to be out in the rain!
Nice fish.  Quite a size difference there.  Although it sucks to stand in the rain, it is nice to have less ppl around you on the water.  Rain didn't seem to scare those two fish off.
Any time spent with the old man is good. Nice fish
Great report and pic 12footspringbok  You sure did better then me..... got skunk this morning in the rain  Thanks for sharing Leechman
